description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A battlefield against others avatares in this fantastic First person shooter,12 players on line, Unlocks all weapons to get an advantage ,Compete online with a global high score list, and have fun with friends.
